body:
Breaking it down

- In the map Division people ACTUALLY attempt to reach blue's spawn.
- Everyone seems to have a large range
- Everyone has high amount of Knockback.

I kinda dislike the fact about picking teams I mean sure people paid money to pick a Team or idk if this is for free but it kind bugs me seeing 4 or 5 prem players on one side every game. 

Anyway you may think "oh he's just bad" True but idc I want this stuff to be fair. At least make Teams going back to being random.

I really don't care I'm throwing this out there cause I'm really pissed. Don't even say "then don't play". I haven't been on Minecaft for a long time and I just what this stuff to be equal.

title: First few Games back on Nexus

replies.body: Then you can donate and be able to pick your team
replies.body_tagged: Then you can donate and be able to pick your team

replies.body: I can do that but I can't read people's minds
replies.body_tagged: I can do that but I can't read people's minds

replies.body:
About the knockback:
There's this relog bug packet priority thing that's been the affect of all this knockback non-sense. Basically, if you logged in latest, you have packet priority over some other players or some sh!t, I don't know.

This video should explain better.

There's this relog bug packet priority thing that's been the affect of all this knockback non-sense. Basically, if you logged in latest, you have packet priority over some other players or some sh!t, I don't know.

This video should explain better.

replies.body: Oh thanks explains a lot why I go flying freakin 12 or 16 blocks
